name: Inheritors of the Oubliette
description:
Overview Inheritors of the Oubliette is a dungeon crawler for the Gameboy Advance, featuring a full resolution first-person engine with depth-based lighting.
Default Controls
  • Up - Move forward or ascend ladder.
  • Down - Move backwards or descend ladder.
  • Left / Right - Turn left or right.
  • Trigger L/R - Strafe left or right.
  • Button A - Interact with environment or select menu item.
  • Button B - Cancel or return to previous menu.
  • Start - Invoke status menu.

The strafe and rotate buttons can be swapped in the game's configuration menu.

The display option in the configuration menu allows you to choose a palette optimized for either the Gameboy Advance or its emulators.

Credits

The game was programmed by Mahou Shoujo Magical Moestar. Textures, level design, enemy graphics and icon graphics were created by one60hp.
Sound effects are from TAM Music Factory and SONNISS.
